components.name: CombatLockOnSystem
components.responsibility: Manages target acquisition and visual feedback based on weapon range.

components.name: LifterMechanic
components.responsibility: Handles the physics and logic for picking up and throwing objects or stunned enemies.

components.name: StatusEffectManager
components.responsibility: Applies and tracks temporary ailments on the player.

components.name: DifficultyScaler
components.responsibility: Adjusts enemy statistics dynamically based on the player's obtained license.

components.name: AlignmentTracker
components.responsibility: Tracks player moral choices to influence NPC reactions and shop prices.

logicFlows: Combat Targeting: Input LockOn -> Scan Entities -> Select Target -> Compare Distance to WeaponRange -> Set Crosshair (Yellow if <= Range, Red if > Range) -> Allow Strafing.
Lifting Interaction: Input Action -> Raycast Check -> If Entity Stunned/Object Liftable -> Attach to Anchor Point -> Input Throw -> Detach -> Apply Physics Impulse -> Collision triggers Damage.
License Progression: Complete Digger Test -> Upgrade License Object -> Broadcast Event 'LicenseRankUp' -> DifficultyScaler multiplies Enemy MaxHP -> Unlock High-Tier Ruins.
Status Ailment: Receive Special Damage -> Check Immunities (Armor/Chips) -> If Vulnerable apply Effect -> Update UI Icon -> Restrict Input/Drain Energy -> Timer Expires or Medicine Used.
securityRequirements: Save Data Integrity: Checksum validation to prevent corruption of progress (Keys/License Rank).
Inventory Bounds Checking: Enforce maximum capacity (99) for consumables to prevent integer overflow.
Collision Boundary Enforcement: Prevent player clipping through ruin geometry or falling out of world bounds during 'Lifter' interactions.
